LanguageData.BatchMakeSurvivalMeals_Desc: Replicate a batch of survival meals for use in caravans or emergencies.
LanguageData.MessageCannotBatchMakeSurvivalMeals: Cannot batch replicate survival meals: Terminal has insufficient feedstock, or is not connected to Computer and Feedstock tanks.
LanguageData.CommandGizmoSwitchAnimalFeed_Desc: Select what type of animal feed to replicate.\n\nCurrent: {0}
LanguageData.AteReplicatedMealTraitDescAppendix: {PAWN_possessive} palate is also sensitive enough to distinguish between replicated and real food, and {PAWN_pronoun} prefers the genuine article.
LanguageData.Replimat_Settings_PrioritizeFoodQuality_: By default, pawns will replicate meals at the highest quality allowed by their current food restriction policy.\n\nDisabling this allows pawns to replicate any random meal within their food restriction policy irrespective of quality.
LanguageData.Replimat_Settings_EnableIncidentSpill_De: Allows any Terminal or Animal Feeder to have a small chance of malfunctioning and spilling feedstock.
LanguageData.Replimat_Settings_EnableIncidentKibble_D: Allows any Terminal to have a small chance of malfunctioning and replicating large amounts of Kibble on its own accord.
LanguageData.Replimat_Settings_EnableIncidentSmokelea: Allows any Terminal to have a small chance of malfunctioning and replicating large amounts of Smokeleaf joints on its own accord.
LanguageData.Replimat_Stat_ActiveModePowerConsumption: The amount of power this building will draw from the power grid while actively running.
